article_title: Stick With Us Despite Birth Control 'Attack'

article_metadata.author: Clare O'Connor

og.description: As it faces controversy for its anti-Obamacare lawsuit, Eden Foods is imploring smaller organic, natural and health food stores -- some of which supported the brand well before Whole Foods existed -- to stick with the company despite a "coordinated attack."
og.title: Eden Foods To Grocers: Stick With Us Despite Birth Control 'Attack'
